label: A rdfs:label
definition: AL definition@en SPLIT=|
detection technique: C 'has part' some ( % and 'detection technique') SPLIT=|
evaluant: C ('has specified input' some (% and 'has role' some 'evaluant role')) and (realizes some ('evaluant role' and ('role of' some %))) SPLIT=|
device: C ('has specified input' some %) and (realizes some (function and ('characteristic of' some %))) SPLIT=|
anatomical site: C 'has specified output' some ('is about' some %)
assessed biological trait: C 'has specified output' some ('is quality measurement of' some %)

label: functional assessment of individual
definition: A physical examination of an organism's ability to perform functional activities.

label: facial atrophy assessment
definition: An observational assessment of the loss of facial muscle tissue due to inactivity or disease.

label: tongue atrophy assessment
definition: An observational assessment of the loss of muscle tissue related to tongue movement due to inactivity or disease.

label: forced cough assessment
definition: A functional assessment of an individual's ability to cough forcefully.

label: speech test assessment
definition: A functional assessment of an individual's ability to understandably repeat spoken sentences.

label: finger to finger assessment
definition: A functional assessment of an individual's ability to touch index fingers together in front of the sternum without oscillation for a specified duration of time

label: nose to finger assessment
definition: A functional assessment of an individual's ability to touch their own nose and then touch an examiners finger in front of them and then touch their own nose once more.

label: dysmetria assessment
definition: A functional assessment of an individual's ability to accurately touch a moving target with their finger and then touch their own chin a number of times in a row.

label: rapid alternating hands assessment
definition: A functional assessment of an individual's ability to alternate the forearm between pronation and suppination as quickly as possible during a specified duration of time

label: finger taps assessment
definition: A functional assessment of an individual's ability to touch their finger-tip to thumb as many times as possible during a specified duration of time.

label: heel along shin assessment
definition: A functional assessment of an individual's ability to slide their heel back and forth along their contralateral tibia from the patella to the ankle with the contralateral leg extended.

label: heel to shin assessment
definition: A functional assessment of an individual's ability to tap their heel to the midpoint of the contralateral shin a number of times.

label: muscle atrophy assessment
definition: An observational assesment of an individual's muscle tissue loss due to inactivity or disease.

label: muscle weakness assessment
definition: A functional assessment of an individual's ability to perform muscle movement to overcome gravity or physical resistence.

label: vibratory sense assessment
definition: A functional assessment of an individual's ability to sense vibration.

label: position sense assessment
definition: A functional assessment of an individual's ability to sense the position of a finger or toe that has been manipulated by minimal random movements.

label: deep tendon reflex assessment
definition: A functional assessment of an individual's muscle contraction when a muscle is triggered by a signal from a muscle spindle in response to a stimulus applied to a specific trigger point on the body.

label: limits of stability assessment
definition: The functional assessment of an individual's ability to maintain balance, posture or upright stability.

label: sitting posture assessment
definition: A limits of stability assessment designed to assess an individual's ability to maintain unsupported posture while sitting over a given time period.

label: stance feet apart assessment
definition: A limits of stability assessment designed to assess an individual's ability to maintain a stable stance with feet 20 cm apart.

label: stance feet apart assessment, with eyes closed
definition: A limits of stability assessment designed to assess an individual's ability to maintain a stable stance with their eyes closed.

label: stance feet together assessment
definition: A limits of stability assessment designed to assess an individual's ability to maintain a stable stance with feet together.

label: stance feet together assessment, with eyes closed
definition: A limits of stability assessment designed to assess an individual's ability to maintain a stable stance with feet together and eyes closed.

label: tandem stance assessment
definition: A limits of stability assessment designed to assess an individual's ability to maintain a stable stance with feet in tandem placement.

label: stance on one foot assessment
definition: A limits of stability assessment designed to assess an individual's ability to maintain a stable stance on one foot.

label: tandem walk assessment
definition: A limits of stability assessment designed to assess an individual's ability to maintain balance while walking in a straight line placing steps in tandem.

label: gait assessment
definition: A limits of stability assessment designed to assess an individual's manner or pattern of walking.

label: bulbar assessment
definition: A functional assessment of an individual's lower cranial nerve function via proxy of facial muscle performance.

label: spontaneous speech assessment
definition: A functional assessment of an individual's ability to articulate spoken words.

label: limb coordination assessment
definition: A functional assessment of an individual's ability to coordinate limb movement.

label: upper limb coordination assessment
definition: A limb coordination assessment designed to assess an individual's ability to coordinate upper limb movement.

label: lower limb coordination assessment
definition: A limb coordination assessment designed to assess an individual's ability to coordinate lower limb movement.

label: nervous system functionality assessment
definition: A functional assesment of an individual's nerve performance. Specifically the nerves connecting the sensory and motor structures with the central nervous system.

label: upright stability assessment
definition: A functional assessment of an individual's ability to maintain upright body posture.

label: deep tendon reflex assessment of the knee joint
definition: A deep tendon reflex assessment of an individual's reaction to stimulus applied to a knee joint.

label: observational assessment of individual
definition: A physical examination of an organism through visual assesment.

label: deep tendon reflex assessment of the ankle joint
definition: A deep tendon reflex assessment of an individual's reaction to stimulus applied to an ankle joint.

label: deep tendon reflex assessment of the tendon of biceps brachii
definition: A deep tendon reflex assessment of an individual's reaction to stimulus applied to a tendon of biceps brachii.

label: deep tendon reflex assessment of the brachioradialis
definition: A deep tendon reflex assessment of an individual's reaction to stimulus applied to a brachioradialis.
